# Pradeep Kumar Raghupathy - Founder & Lead Architect

## Profile Summary
Founder of Spikey Tech Inc. and creator of "Everything Journal". Self-taught iOS & AI developer with 10+ years of experience building production-ready mobile and web applications. Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, GenKit, and On-Device AI.

## Core Competencies
- **Mobile Development:** iOS (Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit), Flutter
- **AI & Machine Learning:** GenKit, Vertex AI, On-Device AI, CoreML
- **Architecture:** MVVM, Clean Architecture, Scalable Systems
- **Cloud & Backend:** Firebase, Google Cloud Platform

## Key Projects

### Everything Journal (2014 - Present)
- **Role:** Founder & Lead Architect
- **Description:** AI-powered journaling app rebuilt with Native Swift/SwiftUI and GenKit.
- **Website:** https://everythingjournal.app

### SteerBig Sadhana Habit App
- **Role:** Lead Developer
- **Description:** Habit tracking and productivity application.
- **Website:** https://steerbig.com

### ProCarp
- **Role:** Lead Developer
- **Description:** Comprehensive fishing companion app.
- **Website:** https://procarpapp.com

## Contact Information
